table.name: IAMUniqueIDRange_RO
table.description: This table will hold the unique id ranges. For ex: ZID will be used for both zoho users [ZID] and client users [CLIENTZID].

column.name: UNIQUE_ID_RANGE_NAME
column.description: Unique name of the range

column.name: RANGE_SIZE
column.description: Batch Size of the range

column.name: RANGE_RESET_THRESHOLD
column.description: The unique ID generator will be assigned a new range if the the difference between max and the current value is lesser that range_reset_threshold

column.name: RESERVED_UPTO
column.description: Max reserved value

column.name: DC_RANGE_RESET_THRESHOLD
column.description: The unique ID generator for this DC will be assigned a new range if the the difference between max and the current value is lesser that dc_range_reset_threshold

column.name: DC_RESERVED_UPTO
column.description: Max reserved value for the DC

column.name: CURRENT_RANGE_STARTING_VALUE
column.description: start value assigned to this range

column.name: UNIQUE_ID_RANGE_NAME
column.description: Unique name of the range

column.name: CURRENT_RANGE_MAX_VALUE
column.description: max value assigned to this range

column.name: UNIQUE_ID_RANGE_NAME
column.description: Unique name of the range

column.name: UNIQUE_ID_NAME
column.description: Unique name of the generator

column.name: RESERVED_FROM
column.description: Range start

column.name: RESERVED_TO
column.description: Range end

table.name: IAMUserVerificationCode_RO
table.description: Stores verification code sent during signin for TFA authentication.

table.name: IAMUserToken_RO
table.description: Represents an authenticated session of a user. An AuthToken is must to access resources stored under an Account.

column.name: TOKEN
column.description: SHA-512 digest of the ZUID and a random number. This token will be exposed to the user browser or any external third party applications.

column.name: TOKEN_TYPE
column.description: Can be a API Token or Temporary token or a SS Ticket or ISC Ticket

column.name: PARENT_TOKEN_ID
column.description: The original token id used to create this token. This token should be valid only till the parent token is valid

column.name: SERVICE_DOMAIN
column.description: Server Domain for which the token is created (For Service Specific Ticket)

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: The IP Address of the user at the time of this token is generated.

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: CREATED_TIME
column.description: The time at which the token is generated

column.name: VALIDITY_PERIOD
column.description: How long the token is valid, in milli seconds i.e expiry time

column.name: IDLE_PERIOD
column.description: How long the token can be idle, in seconds

column.name: IS_ONE_TIME_TOKEN
column.description: If it is a one time token, the token will be deleted on the first GET operation itself

table.name: IAMUserTokenDetails_RO
table.description: Access to Account resources using an AuthToken can be restricted to limitted operations. For example, "access using an AuthToken can be scoped to perform read operation on Organization owned documents"

column.name: DETAILS
column.description: The token details will be encrypted value.

table.name: IAMUserAllDomainsToken_RO
table.description: This is the table to maintain the base raw tokens which is for all the domains

column.name: TOKEN
column.description: Raw base token for the all the domains.

column.name: VALIDITY_PERIOD
column.description: How long the token is valid, in milli seconds i.e expiry time

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or devide the access has been made.

column.name: IP_AUDIT_INFO
column.description: iplocation info will be stored as JSON object.

column.name: SIGNIN_INFO
column.description: Information about user got signed in to their account.

table.name: IAMUserBaseDomainToken_RO
table.description: This is the table to maintain the base domain tokens digest

column.name: BASE_DOMAIN_TOKEN
column.description: Base domain digest token

table.name: IAMUserTokenPairDetails_RO
table.description: This is the table to maintain the base domain tokens digest

column.name: DETAILS
column.description: The token details will be encrypted value.

column.name: IDLE_SESSION_TIMEOUT
column.description: If session is not active for the mentioned amount of time, session should be cleared. This value is based on Auth Domain Policy

table.name: IAMUserTokenPairAuthToken_RO
table.description: This is the table to maintain the temporary tokens to set ADT and BDT tokens for the other zoho service and custom domains.

column.name: AUTH_TOKEN
column.description: Temp and API tokens for ADT and BDT tokens

column.name: TYPE
column.description: To differentiate tickets in token pair 0-temporary, 1-apitoken

table.name: IAMSamlAppSessionIndex_RO
table.description: This table is to maintain the Session index give to Service Porvider .

column.name: SESSION_INDEX
column.description: SAML Session index

column.name: APP_TYPE
column.description: To differentiate type of app using which client has got access 0-saml, 1-OIDC

table.name: IAMAccountAudit_RO
table.description: Sign Up, Sign In, Sign Out and Close time of an Account member

column.name: ARID
column.description: Unique Identifier of this audit record

column.name: ZAID
column.description: Unique Identifier of the Zoho Account

column.name: ZUID
column.description: Unique Identifier of the user

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: IP Address of the user from where the access is originated

column.name: TOKEN_DIGEST
column.description: Message digest(SHA512) of the auth token used

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or device the access has been made.

table.name: IAMAPIAudit_RO
table.description: Sign Up, Sign In, Sign Out and Close time of an Account member

column.name: ARID
column.description: Unique Identifier of this audit record

column.name: ZAID
column.description: Unique Identifier of the Zoho Account

column.name: ZUID
column.description: Unique Identifier of the user

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: Unique Identifier of the service

column.name: SCREEN_NAME
column.description: Unique Identifier of the Application Account

column.name: OPERATION
column.description: Accounts Operation

column.name: IP_ADDRESS
column.description: IP Address of the user from where the access is originated

column.name: TOKEN_DIGEST
column.description: Message digest(SHA512) of the auth token used

column.name: USER_AGENT
column.description: Using which browser or device the access has been made.

column.name: VALUE
column.description: value

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessToken_RO
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: USER_ZID
column.description: Token's Owner ZID.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: 1- User , 2- appaccount , 3 - serviceOrg

column.name: REFRESH_TOKEN
column.description: Refresh token of the user for this client

column.name: ACCESS_TOKEN
column.description: Access token for getting access to the client resource.

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessTokenScopes_RO
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed scopes for the particular project.

column.name: SCOPE_ID
column.description: ID of the scope required. Will have from App.SCOPE_ID

table.name: IAMOAuthAccessTokenOrgInfo_RO
table.description: This table will contain default/allowed ServiceOrg/App-Account details for the particular project.

column.name: ZID
column.description: Store ZSOID or ZAAID depending on the user.

column.name: ZIDTYPE
column.description: Service-Org=0, App-Account=1

column.name: SERVICE_NAME
column.description: Service name of the ZID
